Title: Dragon Ball: Episode of Bardock
Genre: Animation, Action, Drama, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Makoto Koyama, Naho Oishi, Akira Toriyama (creator)
Actors: Masashi Ebara, Keiji Hirai, Sayaka Hirao, Kazuyuki Ishikawa
Plot: The continuing adventures of Goku's father Bardock, who traveled through time and met new friends and enemies.
